text: If the 'Post' can play the role of a connector between the West and the East, I have confidence in the paper's future success.

author: Evan Esar
text: The girl with a future avoids a man with a past.

author: An Wang
text: You have to risk failure to succeed. The important thing is not to make one single mistake that will jeopardize the future.

author: Lee Kun-hee
text: There's an ongoing competition by global companies across all areas from products, technology development and hiring talented people to patent disputes. The market is big and opportunities are wide open, so we should find out new businesses that Samsung's future will hinge on.

author: Mark Rutte
text: Our ability to create jobs, our future growth, is built on the free market. It's built on open borders.

author: Walter O'Brien
text: I was about nine years old when a teacher administered my IQ test. Unfortunately, as I was nine, I didn't know that I needed to keep the paperwork for future reference.

author: Joe Baca
text: Pearl Harbor caused our Nation to wholeheartedly commit to winning World War II, changing the course of our Nation's history and the world's future.

author: Buffalo Bill
text: Frontiersmen good and bad, gunmen as well as inspired prophets of the future, have been my camp companions. Thus, I know the country of which I am about to write as few men now living have known it.

author: Peter L. Bergen
text: The Obama administration has framed its defense of the controversial bulk collection of all American phone records as necessary to prevent a future 9/11.

author: Julian Castro
text: Hopefully, in not a too distant future, we will see a Latino president, and who knows how's that going to happen. It's just a matter of time.

author: Julia Gillard
text: Our future growth relies on competitiveness and innovation, skills and productivity... and these in turn rely on the education of our people.

author: James Wolcott
text: High expectations weren't nurtured in my neck of nowhere back then - children weren't fawned over from an early age as 'gifted' and groomed for a prizewinning future; self-esteem was considered something you had to pick from the garden yourself.

author: Rand Paul
text: I was elected to the Senate in 2010 by people worried about our country, worried about our kids and their future.

author: George Linnaeus Banks
text: For the cause that lacks assistance, the wrong that needs resistance, for the future in the distance, and the good that I can do.

author: John Dewey
text: Education, therefore, is a process of living and not a preparation for future living.

author: Andrew Wiles
text: I hope that seeing the excitement of solving this problem will make young mathematicians realize that there are lots and lots of other problems in mathematics which are going to be just as challenging in the future.

author: Donald Trump
text: I try to learn from the past, but I plan for the future by focusing exclusively on the present. That's where the fun is.

author: Yuna
text: I'm based here in L.A., but I think in the future I might consider settling down in Malaysia when I start a family.

author: Otto Wallach
text: May the work for the further development of chemical science, which has its strongest roots in this beautiful, strong and hard-working country of Sweden, continue to flourish in the future, for the promotion of culture and the benefit of mankind.

author: Stephen Hawking
text: I think the human race doesn't have a future if it doesn't go into space.

author: Jane D. Hull
text: The Growing Smarter laws now in place compel every community to plan their future growth and allow every citizen the right to be heard when those decisions are made.

author: Grace Lee Boggs
text: I was working with C. L. R. James; I believed in Marxist ideas about the labor and movement and the workers being the secret to the future. And I learned differently just by being in Detroit and being married to Jimmy Boggs.

author: Shailene Woodley
text: I'm already the most fortunate girl in the world, so I have zero expectations for what the future will bring.

author: Jose Ortega y Gasset
text: Life is an operation which is done in a forward direction. One lives toward the future, because to live consists inexorably in doing, in each individual life making itself.

author: Daniel Kahneman
text: We don't see very far in the future, we are very focused on one idea at a time, one problem at a time, and all these are incompatible with rationality as economic theory assumes it.

author: Lord Byron
text: I shall soon be six-and-twenty. Is there anything in the future that can possibly console us for not being always twenty-five?

author: George Crumb
text: The future will be the child of the past and the present, even if a rebellious child.

author: Cass Sunstein
text: If a company has acted badly, people want to punish it - not in order to deter future misconduct, but simply because they're outraged. And the more outraged they are, the more punishment they want to inflict.

author: Michael Hastings
text: I welcome all interviews with 'Rolling Stone' magazine, and I'm sure people will talk to me in the future.

author: Jerry Falwell, Jr.
text: We believe that Liberty will redefine what is considered an academically prestigious university in the future.

author: William Godwin
text: My thoughts will be taken up with the future or the past, with what is to come or what has been. Of the present there is necessarily no image.

author: Brian Eno
text: I've noticed a terrible thing, which is I will agree to anything if it's far enough in the future.

author: Anthony Goldbloom
text: Big data is mostly about taking numbers and using those numbers to make predictions about the future. The bigger the data set you have, the more accurate the predictions about the future will be.

author: Nicole Kidman
text: When you relinquish the desire to control your future, you can have more happiness.

author: Marco Arment
text: With Betaworks' drive and resources now behind it, I'm confident that Instapaper has a very bright future. I'm looking forward to seeing what they can do.

text: The trouble with the future is that it usually arrives before we're ready for it.

author: John Kasich
text: If we intend to provide a better life, and a better world, for future generations, we can't ignore the quality of the environment we leave them.

author: Zainab Salbi
text: As women, we must speak out, speak up, say no to our inheritance of loss and yes to a future of women-led dialogue about women's rights and value.

author: Alexi Zentner
text: To map the Governor General's Award is to map both the past and the future of Canadian literature, and to be nominated for my first book is wonderful.

author: Rudolf Steiner
text: Just as future eclipses of the Sun and Moon are indicated in the present relations of those bodies, so are future earthly lives indicated in what now lives within us.

author: Ban Ki-moon
text: The clear and present danger of climate change means we cannot burn our way to prosperity. We already rely too heavily on fossil fuels. We need to find a new, sustainable path to the future we want. We need a clean industrial revolution.

author: Condoleezza Rice
text: I'm a very happy university professor... the best thing about being a university professor is that you see young people as they're being shaped and molded toward their own future, and you have a chance to be a part of that.

text: The future? Like unwritten books and unborn children, you don't talk about it.

author: Dave Heineman
text: But, I don't want to assume that our tradition of excellence is a guarantee of future excellence.

author: Johnny Van Zant
text: Who knows what the heck the future will bring.

author: Jenna Morasca
text: Newsflash for any of the current, past or future Survivors out there... when you contemplate strategizing about the other team, the best idea is to shut up and keep it to yourself. You're welcome; this bill is in the mail.

author: Seneca
text: Enjoy present pleasures in such a way as not to injure future ones.

text: If we see to it that the Israelis, Palestinians and Jordanians have jobs, we will actually be securing our own future.

text: I mean that at least 80% of the Russian people feel destitute. It's the people who had their past and future taken from them - they don't get paid - many of them face a wall. They have nowhere to go.

author: Jay Rockefeller
text: We have to bring stability to Iraq, otherwise we will be faced with a future dilemma of sending our loved ones into harms way to stop a civil war or the rise of a new tyrant born from the instability that we created.
